name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Beijing News, on October 11, Mr. Qiu from Ruyuan, Guangdong reported to reporters that when his daughter turned on the water at school, a senior student said he would help to unscrew the lid, and then poured boiling water on his daughter, scalding her face, chest and thighs. Mr. Qiu's wife suspected that it was intentional injury and has called the police. Deputy Director Feng Chunrun told reporters that this was a prank by the boy involved on the spur of the moment, and it was not intentional or malicious. After investigation, it was found that the abnormal water temperature caused by the malfunction of the direct drinking water machine was also one of the causes of this incident, and the school was responsible for safety management.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12 and 13, the Shanghai uncle who predicted the stock market boom appeared at the "Stock Market Salon" in front of the Urban Headquarters Building in Huangpu District, Shanghai. He was watched by a large number of stock investors. He seemed to have become a top Internet celebrity, and he seemed to have "bodyguards" around him. He said: "The Shanghai Composite Index will break through 4,000 points in the first week of November." "Don't recognize me as soon as it rises, and question me as soon as it adjusts!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13, at the "2024 Xunyi Half Marathon" in Xunyi County, Shaanxi Province, when a black runner was rushing towards the finish line, a man in red suddenly jumped out, ran to the black runner and wanted to take a photo, but was stopped by the staff. The person in charge said: The man in red is not a half marathon runner, but a "mini" runner, and he rushed over to take photos to attract traffic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A gas poisoning accident occurred at a biological company in Shouguang, Shandong. On October 12, the Shouguang Emergency Management Bureau of Shandong Province issued a notice on its official website stating that at around 13:30 on October 12, 2024, a gas poisoning accident occurred at Weifang Jinshi Biotechnology Co., Ltd., killing 7 people and injuring 4 people. The vital signs of the injured are stable. The persons responsible for the accident have been controlled. At present, the aftermath work and the investigation of the cause of the accident are underway. On October 13, a staff member of the Shouguang Emergency Management Bureau told Red Star News reporters that the cause of the accident was that hydrogen sulfide gas was produced in a closed and limited space during fermentation. "After the gas was produced, the people who entered died."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Caixin.com, the Shanghai Stock Exchange outage was finally resolved by restarting the system. As the cause of the problem could not be confirmed, the problem was finally resolved after trying to restart the trading system on the afternoon of September 29. A professional familiar with the situation said that the exchange's operating system is relatively old, and when the system load is too high and the memory is exhausted, the program cannot process requests normally, or even freezes completely.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens found that on Xiaohongshu, there are a large number of "bloodhead" intermediaries in part-time groups in Xi'an, Yunnan, Chongqing, Taiyuan, Beijing and other places. According to netizens, these intermediaries charge the patients' families 1,000 yuan for 400cc of whole blood (2 therapeutic doses of platelets), and the more intermediaries go through, the more the family members pay, and the less the young blood sellers get.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens in Xi'an said that there are a large number of such "blood collection" intermediaries in Xi'an. These intermediaries can not only give money but also issue blood donation certificates. Many college students and unemployed people choose to sell blood to them. Employees of the Central Blood Station said that they have reported it many times, but it was useless.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12, Yunnan included assisted reproduction in medical insurance reimbursement. The Yunnan Provincial Medical Insurance Bureau, together with the Health Commission, issued the "Notice on Providing a Good Medical Care for Assisted Reproduction".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of October 12, in Luzhou, Changzhi, Shanxi, a woman at Changgang Wangzhuang Market coaxed a merchant's child and was about to take him away. The child's father, who was frying dough sticks, found out and called the police. According to the police report, the woman involved, Cheng Moumou (51 years old, a villager in a village in Huangnian Town, Luzhou District), is a patient with mental disorders and has been taking psychotropic drugs for a long time under the supervision of her family. At present, the public security organs have cooperated with the family to send Cheng Moumou to the hospital for treatment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Around 22:00 on October 12, Chengdu, Sichuan. A fire accident occurred in Dongsheng Street, Jiujiang North, Shuangliu District. A mushroom cloud rose in the sky and the light cut through the night sky. Witnesses told reporters that a tanker truck selling private oil leaked and caused the fire. The fire kept expanding and thick smoke rolled. After the incident, many fire trucks went to the rescue and the scene was blocked. On the 13th, the reporter called the Shuangliu District Emergency Management Bureau, and the staff said that the vehicle was burning in the open space. The police reported that there were no casualties and the cause of the accident was under investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 12, Chengdu, Sichuan. On a rainy day, a "Laotoule" tricycle driving against traffic on the expressway was hit by a car that failed to dodge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13 (published), Henan Anyang Vocational and Technical College closed the school gate near the snack street during meal time. Netizens and students questioned whether the school was forcing students to eat in the school cafeteria. On the morning of October 12, a reporter contacted the security department of Anyang Vocational and Technical College. The staff said that the north gate was closed during meal time for food safety considerations. The school leaders are currently discussing this matter. Before the official results come out, the school north gate will be closed at 9 pm, but other times are open for entry and exit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The local police began to block the news, requiring everyone to delete the pictures and videos in their hands and not to forward or spread them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12, at a press conference held by the State Council Information Office, Liao Min, Vice Minister of Finance, revealed that a new real estate tax policy will be introduced. The government is currently working to clarify the value-added tax and land value-added tax policies that are linked to the cancellation of the standards for ordinary residential and non-ordinary residential properties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13, the chairman of the Chinese Chamber of Commerce in Lebanon revealed that due to the recent explosions of communication equipment in Lebanon, Lebanon will import mobile phones and other electronic equipment from China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13, Ukrainian President Zelensky released a video publicly accusing North Korea of sending soldiers to Russia.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of October 14, Henan Village Bank depositors called the Henan Provincial Party Committee Organization Department again to inquire about the progress of the investigation and judgment on the promotion of Zhang Linlin, who had previously given depositors a red code. The staff of the Henan Provincial Party Committee Organization Department responded again that they had reported it to the leaders many times and could not respond to the people for the time being.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 10, Puyang, Henan. Owners of Longtai Yujing put up banners to accuse the developer of not installing floor heating.
October 10, Wenzhou, Zhejiang. Owners of a building in Longgang Future Community of Evergrande defended their rights against the property management company over the dispute over window sealing.
October 7, Liuzhou, Guangxi. Villagers protested against the developer occupying the land returned by the government.
October 9 (published), Shangqiu, Henan. Owners of Shangcheng Mingdu Community in Yucheng County protested against the delay in the delivery of houses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 11, Yingkou, Liaoning. Homeowners of Gaizhou International New City gathered in front of the government to protest against the blockage of the community road.
October 9, villagers in Shaanxi blocked an excavator to demand five years of land compensation.
October 14, Shijiazhuang, Hebei. Lecheng International Trade City has been illegally selling for many years without a pre-sale certificate, and hundreds of shop owners marched to demand a refund.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 14, in Nanchang, Jiangxi, a couple set up a stall to sell fruit on the road. Law enforcement officers repeatedly advised them to leave. The couple did not listen to the advice. The man broke down and cried, took out his and his wife's disability certificates, and knelt down on the street. The fruit was scattered all over the ground, causing a large-scale traffic jam.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 14, in Yanjin, Henan, a government worker stopped farmers from harvesting peanuts with machines, saying, "There are leaders from the province inspecting, and the harvesters are creating too much dust." Farmers questioned, "We have to harvest in the rain because the leaders are coming to inspect? You do it for work, and I do it for life." The relevant departments responded that it was a misunderstanding.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Is the report true? On October 13, the Chongqing Market Supervision and Administration Bureau reported that "expired rice from grain depots was sold to rural schools": there were illegal acts such as false labeling of expiration dates, and they would be dealt with seriously and would not be tolerated. The report stated that the rice used in the substitution was not expired rice, but "dynamic rotation rice" in the grain depot, and it was not only sold to rural schools, but to the whole society.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of October 13, Sima Nan live-streamed at Pangdonglai Angel City in Xuchang, Henan, but was persuaded to leave after only 13 minutes. The staff on site said they did not accept live-streaming, fearing that it would "interfere with customer privacy." On the 14th, a staff member responded to reporters that "the store currently refuses all live-streaming activities."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "Joint Sword 2024B" puts "blockade of Taiwan" on the table for the first time. Is Taiwan independence panicking? On October 14, the Eastern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army organized the theater army, navy, air force, rocket force and other forces to carry out the "Joint Sword-2024B" exercise in the waters around Taiwan. Ships and aircraft approached Taiwan Island from multiple directions, and various military services conducted joint assaults, focusing on sea and air combat readiness patrols, blockade of key ports and areas, sea and land strikes, and seizing comprehensive control rights, to test the actual combat capabilities of the theater troops in joint operations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Errata: After reminder and verification by enthusiastic netizens, this video is from October 2023.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "Typhoons" continue? Since the beginning of this year, several hacker groups named "Typhoons" have been exposed to be instigated by China to attack and infiltrate the US network, including "Volt Typhoon", "Salt Typhoon", "Flax Typhoon" and other organizations. On October 14, Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman Mao Ning responded at a press conference that China urges the US to immediately stop cyber attacks around the world and stop using cyber security issues to slander and smear China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12, North Korea instructed its border troops to enter a firing readiness posture. Kim Yo-jong, vice minister of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made tough speeches for three consecutive days, accusing the South Korean military of sending drones to spread anti-North Korean leaflets in Pyongyang and warning that if South Korean drones appear again, it will be regarded as a declaration of war. He also said that if the sovereignty of a nuclear-armed country is violated by forces domesticated by the United States, then its owner (the United States) should be held responsible. The South Korean military denied that it had sent drones, suspecting that it was a self-directed and self-acted performance by the North Korean side, and issued a warning on the 13th that if the safety of South Korean citizens is endangered, the North Korean regime will end.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 14, the Nobel Prize in Economics was announced and was awarded to three American scholars, Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson and James A. Robinson, in recognition of their research on "how institutions are formed and affect prosperity". The Nobel Committee said that the three economists "demonstrated the importance of social institutions to a country's prosperity" and that "societies with poor rule of law and institutions that exploit the people will not bring growth or improvement", and also "explained why extractive economic institutions and dictatorships persist, even though reforms will bring more benefits".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 13, in Shiyan, Hubei, Yuan, the chairman of the Zhushan County Writers Association, caused trouble at the Zhushan Lijing Holiday Hotel, insulted the hotel front desk staff and threatened that "I have the final say in Zhushan."
